backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the gratitude journal backend with add, get (sorted by timestamp descending), and delete operations stored in a persistent Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (plant garden visualization, view toggle, nature-inspired styling) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the app shell (Header, HeroBanner, GratitudeStats, GratitudeForm) and a Garden/List view toggle, defaulting to the PlantGarden view.
frontend/src/components/Branch.tsx: SVG leaf component positioned around a plant that shows a tooltip popover with the gratitude entry text and relative timestamp on hover, focus, or click.
frontend/src/components/GratitudeForm.ts: Form component for submitting new gratitude entries with a textarea, optional category input with quick-select suggestions, and loading state via the useAddEntry mutation.
frontend/src/components/GratitudeList.ts: Renders a list of gratitude journal entries as cards with category badges, relative timestamps, and delete buttons, plus skeleton loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/GratitudeStats.t: Displays a summary banner showing the total number of gratitude entries and a motivational message that scales with entry count.
frontend/src/components/Plant.tsx: Renders a single animated plant visual for a gratitude category, showing a stage-appropriate image with branch/leaf overlays and a grow animation triggered by new entries.
frontend/src/components/PlantGarden.tsx: Displays a scrollable garden scene with sky and ground backgrounds, rendering a Plant component for each grouped gratitude category with skeleton and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching, adding, and deleting gratitude entries via the backend actor, with optimistic updates for deletion.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Lora, Inter), sets up Tailwind directives, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and declares plant/garden keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/formatDate.ts: Utility functions to format bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable date strings and relative time strings (e.g., '2 hours ago').
frontend/src/utils/plantGrouping.ts: Utility module that groups gratitude entries by category, determines plant growth stage (seed/sprout/sapling/tree) based on entry count, and provides helpers for plant images, sizes, and stage labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH CSS variable-based colors, custom fonts (Lora/Inter), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations; includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file describing the gratitude tracking app's architecture, existing features, required image assets, and versioning information for build planning.
